column10: Incidents w/ cyclists on W&OD Trail-Arlington is awful. Walkers, recreational cyclists & drivers are obeying signs and are appropriately cautious. I live by the intersection of S. Four Mile Run Drive and Oakland. Even with the crosswalk lights, cars will still drive by pedestrians even when the lights are flashing, and frequently drive over the speed limit. My mother on her way to pick up her car from the mechanicâ€™s place , pressed the button before crossing and halfway through the crosswalk a car with Maryland tags drove right past her without even slowing down for a bit.
